diodeCount.description: number of diodes in the package

numberOfProtectedLines.description: number of lines a diode can protect

vf.comment: conditions include: forward current of diode under which a given forward voltage was measured

if.description: continuous forward current of a diode

ifm.description: maximum continuous forward current a diode can support

ifrm.description: maximum repetitive peak forward current a diode can support

ifsm.description: maximum non-repetitive surge forward current a diode can support

ir.comment: conditions include: reverse bias voltage under which reverse leakage current occurs

vz.description: breakdown voltage of a zener diode
vz.comment: conditions include: minimum reverse current condition under which breakdown voltage of a zener diode is achieved

vrm.description: maximum reverse standoff voltage a tvs diode can withstand

vcl.description: clamping voltage of a tvs diode
vcl.comment: conditions include: surge current condition under which a tvs clamping voltage occurs

vr.description: maximum continuous reverse biased voltage a diode can support

vrrm.description: maximum repetitive reverse voltage pulses a diode can support

cd.description: diode junction capacitance - between the anode and cathode- in reverse bias condition

trr.description: reverse recovery time it takes the diode to stop conducting when its voltage changes from forward-bias to reverse-bias

pTot.description: maximum power dissipation of a forward biased diode

ifVsVf.description: graph of forward current (If) as a function of forward voltage (VfTyp)
